spec.description: Canonical URL for the AI Domain Data specification version.

name.description: Public-facing name for the site, organization, or publisher.

description.description: Concise description used by AI agents to understand the domain.

website.description: Primary website URL for the domain.

logo.description: Optional URL to a logo or representative image.

entity_type.description: Optional classification for the domain. MUST use schema.org @type values directly for maximum interoperability: Organization, Person, Blog, NGO, Community, Project, CreativeWork, SoftwareApplication, or Thing. See the spec for recommended values.

jsonld.description: Optional embedded JSON-LD block for alignment with schema.org. Consumers can safely ignore this field if they do not process JSON-LD.
